title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 164.5 - Police presence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 164.5 - Police presence

State Regulations

To the extent practicable, there shall be a police presence
at major active work zones. Whether or not such a presence is practicable shall
include, but not be limited to, such consideration as available
resources. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
164.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
